SML/NJ 2022.1 Distribution

Installing SML/NJ

macOS installer package for 64-bit Intel hardware

You can either use the "generic Unix" procedure above or you can install a pre-built system using an installer package. We provide a 64-bit installer for Intel Macs:

  • smlnj-amd64-2022.1.pkg.

The macOS installer (on Intel) puts SML/NJ in the directory /usr/local/smlnj; if you have a previous version installed, then it will be updated in place. If you wish to install at a different location, you should use the build procedure for Unix systems.

The installer works on macOS Catalina and later, but you will need to right-click on the installer to launch it, since it is not a notarized installer.

macOS on 64-bit Intel hardware from GitHub

Follow the instructions in the project README for building the system from the repository sources. The 2022.1 boot files can be found http://smlnj.cs.uchicago.edu/dist/working/2022.1/boot.amd64-unix.tgz.

macOS on Apple Silicon

We are currently working on a native port of SML/NJ for Apple's new Arm-based hardware. Meanwhile, version 110.99.3 is known to run on Apple Silicon Macs using the Rosetta2 emulation system.

Linux

Because of an issue with LLVM and ELF object files that we have not yet figured out, this version does not support Linux.

Microsoft Windows

This version does not support Windows.
